citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b)
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30-10am on
09/09/2014.
Inspectors from USDA and Missouri Department of Agriculture knocked on the residence door, waited 30 minutes
and called the licensee in attempts to make contact for a an inspection. .

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
